name: One Night At Slenderman's Lair 2
description:
This is the sequel to the original One Night At Slenderman's Lair that was made in Scratch. 

After escaping from the Slenderman's Lair theme park, Robert Betts returns to the park. He promised himself that he will come back after he finishes college to end the horrors of Slenderman. However, the park has been updated.

Kate was added to the park. Kate is a human that was captured by Slenderman and transformed into a zombie in the game "Slender: The Arrival". The park layout has also been changed. Robert is hesitant about doing this, but he must finish it.

WILL YOU BE ABLE TO FINISH IT?

See Patreon for Beta key.
